DOC.brief_summary: We will evaluate the effect on the gastroduodenal mucosa from oral dosing of three different treatments
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Effect on Gastroduodenal Mucosa of PA32540, PA32540 and Celecoxib, and Aspirin With Celecoxib
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or nonpregnant female subjects greater than or equal to 50 years as well as other standard inclusion criteria for a study of this nature Standard exclusion criteria for a study of this nature
